main_definition: Negative refers to something that is opposite or unfavorable, such as a negative attitude, negative feedback, or the absence of positivity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Believing things are bad or harmful
meanings_and_examples.example: She has a negative view of politics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opposite to positive, not expressing approval or support
meanings_and_examples.example: The customer gave us negative feedback about our service.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In mathematics and science, representing a value that is less than zero on the number line
meanings_and_examples.example: A test score of 75 out of 100 would be considered negative in this context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An effect or reaction opposed to what was desired or intended
meanings_and_examples.example: His illness had a negative impact on his work performance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In photography, the darkest part of an image where little light reaches
meanings_and_examples.example: The shadows in this photograph are quite pronounced and dark, giving it a distinct negative look.
